sentence.Network_en: Beyond this view a small slice of the north polar terrain of Mars.
sentence.Network_cn: 远处有一小部分火星极地的地形.

sentence.Network_en: It rotated to north polar region, zoomed into ice fields , and then down a volcanic caldera.
sentence.Network_cn: 它转向北极地区, 放大冰原,深入一个火山口.

sentence.Network_en: Two trains collided head-on in north-eastern Germany early this morning.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天早上德国东北部两列火车迎面相撞。

list.abs: this image provided by NASA shows a view of the north polar ice cap on Mars taken by NASAs Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter .这张由美国航太总署提供的照片显示，火星侦察轨道器拍下的火星北极冰帽样貌。
